name: Jewels Loop
description:
The strategy of jewels movements is in your hand until you have no more moves! 

Move and align 3 or more stones to get increasingly valuable jewels. 

The goal is keep the board empty to possibility make more jewels combinations. That way the game can last a lifetime and the stones stay in 'Loop'.

This is a relaxing and concentration game to all ocasions. You can put your name on leaderboards of high scores and participate in the challenges.
